level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: Section 209 of D.C. Law 18-156 added a section to read as follows:

"The Mayor, pursuant to Title 1 of the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act, approved October 21, 1968 (82 Stat. 1204; D.C. Official Code ยง 2-501 et seq.), may issue rules to implement the provisions of this act."
Section 402(b) of D.C. Law 18-156 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 209 of Energy Efficiency Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-324, March 1, 2010, 57 DCR 1851).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-183, see notes following ยง 8-1778.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority--Energy Efficiency Financing Act of 2010, see Mayor's Order 2010-118, July 16, 2010 (57 DCR 6212).
